translations: v.磨粉（pulverize 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 磨碎, 粉碎的, 粉化, 几率
磨粉机, 粉机, 磨碎机, 粉碎机
粉碎拌合机, 松土拌和机, 粉碎拌和机
制粉系统, 燃煤制粉系统

sentences.sentence: All of this will be a moot point once the robot armies rise to power and start pulverizing each other with scrap metal.
sentences.translation: 一旦机器人军队掌权并开始用废金属互相摧毁，所有这些都将成为争论点。

sentences.sentence: Marcus had proved his prowess in the ring by pulverizing all challengers.
sentences.translation: 拳击台上，马科斯彻底击败了所有挑战者，从而证明了他高超的本领。

sentences.sentence: At present, mechanical pulverizing method is one of the most available superfine particle preparation methods.
sentences.translation: 现有超细粉体制备技术中，机械粉碎方法是最常用的方法之一。
